meanings.definition: In a lazy or idle manner.
meanings.sent1: She lay on the couch indolently, watching TV all day.
meanings.sent2: He walked indolently down the street, taking his time.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched indolently in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The clouds drifted indolently across the sky, in no hurry to move.
meanings.sent5: The old man rocked indolently on his chair, lost in thought.

meanings.definition: Showing a disposition to avoid exertion.
meanings.sent1: The indolent student always avoided doing his homework.
meanings.sent2: She had an indolent attitude towards exercise, preferring to relax.
meanings.sent3: The indolent sloth slept all day, never wanting to move.
meanings.sent4: The indolent cat lazed in the sun, ignoring any calls to play.
meanings.sent5: His indolent behavior at work led to his eventual dismissal.
